scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:plugins-query && bun run build:plugins-unstorage
scripts.version:core:patch: cd packages/core && bun pm version patch
scripts.version:core:minor: cd packages/core && bun pm version minor
scripts.version:plugins:query:patch: cd packages/plugins/query && bun pm version patch
scripts.version:plugins:query:minor: cd packages/plugins/query && bun pm version minor
scripts.version:plugins:unstorage:patch: cd packages/plugins/unstorage && bun pm version patch
scripts.version:plugins:unstorage:minor: cd packages/plugins/unstorage && bun pm version minor
